workExperience.description: Utilized Python for automating weekly reporting tasks and SQL for data manipulation. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement Tableau dashboards for marketing strategies.
Analyzed business data using Java to provide technical consulting services to optimize operations. Supported client projects with actionable insights derived from data-driven solutions.
Contributed to defining requirements and coordinating development and launch activities for a mobile app using Java. Gathered user feedback to enhance the product lifecycle management.

projectExperience.description: Led a team to analyze customer behavior and proposed optimization strategies for an e-commerce platform. Implemented solutions using Python, Java, and JavaScript.
Developed a personal finance app using Python and integrating real-time stock data APIs. Enhanced UI/UX for better user engagement utilizing JavaScript.

education.description: Relevant coursework included Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, SQL for Data Science, and Software Engineering Principles.
